text:
Do you have any favorite sports, Producer?
We want to get active together...

If we're going to do it, maybe splitting into teams
and playing sports would be good!

Haha, favorite sports, huh?
I'm not as skilled as Meguru though...

...Surprising. It seems like Meguru and
Producer should be on different teams.

It's a shame we can't be on the same team...
but I'll show you, Producer!

Oh, really...! The Producer might
have an advantage being bigger than us...!

If I could be on the same team as the Producer...
I'll do my best not to hold us back...!

If it's table tennis, it seems like something we can
easily do and then relax in a hot spring afterward...!

Come to think of it... why a hot spring?
Wait, let me look it up.
